DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control trial new behavioral intervention design improve engagement HIV care same-sex male couple . Investigators compare HIV viral load outcome couple randomize couples-based adherence intervention ( DuoPACT ) individual adherence intervention ( LifeSteps ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator test intervention improve HIV care engagement enrol 150 same-sex male couple randomize 75 couple one two condition : 1 ) DuoPACT , newly-developed couple intervention ; 2 ) LifeSteps , standardize antiretroviral adherence intervention HIV+ individual . After randomization , intervention session deliver weekly ( 6 DuoPACT session , 3 Life Steps session ) . All couple assess pre/post intervention evaluate intervention effect via behavioral indicator engagement HIV care , couple 's relationship dynamic , primary outcome HIV viral load .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18+ year old ; 2 . Assigned male sex birth currently identify male ; 3 . In primary romantic relationship another man least 3 month ; 4 . At least one partner HIV+ ; 5 . Englishspeaking ; 6 . Able provide inform consent ; 7 . For HIV+ men : Evidence suboptimal engagement HIV care , indicate one following : ( ) Not ART ; ( b ) Reporting recent viral load detectable/unknown ; ( c ) If ART , report less perfect adherence validate adherence rating scale ( report self partner ) ; ( ) Reporting HIV primary care appointment prior 8 month . 1 . Must able consent follow study protocol . 2 . Evidence severe cognitive impairment active psychosis , determine PI .
